title: Fruit-Stuffed Chicken Breasts
ingredients: ['35g dates, pitted and chopped', '1 small apple, peeled, cored and chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped dried apricots', '2 tablespoons raisins', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest', '1 tablespoon orange juice', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/4 teaspoon ground mace', '2 (175g) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil']
